Text: Yes, I too have very limited bandwidth. One secret I now know is to use Utorrent and make my torrents using their preseed and then keep seeding. Anyway,I am downloading both your tales from the crypt. That was good stuff back in the day. Check back in day or so and I will comment on Quality.  Thank you for your time and effort on the upload.

Cheers mate!
